#summary Golf Markup Language Documentation: complexType HolePlacement.

== Name ==

HolePlacement (complexType)

  	

===  Super Types ===
{{{
anyType
  |
  +--HolePlacement (restriction)
}}}
----
    

===  Documentation ===
        
				Description of the placement on the hole on the surface of the green.
		
  	
===  Properties ===

  	This component is not nillable.
---- 	
        
===  Model ===
{{{
          <...>  (distances | coordinates) </...>
}}}
----
    

=== Nested Element Summary ===
        
|| [CRoomForExtension golfml:RoomForExtension] || [CRoomForExtension coordinates] ||  Description of the placement on the hole on the surface of the green with an alternate localisation system. ||
|| [CHolePlacementWithDistances golfml:HolePlacementWithDistances] || [CHolePlacementWithDistances distances] ||  					Position of hole relative to the edges of the green.				 ||

===  Local Usage ===

    	[CHolePlacements HolePlacements]
